name: notification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the act of telling someone officially about something, or a document, etc. that does this: You must give the bank (a) written notification if you wish to close your account. The car's owner would receive notification that the vehicle failed inspection.
[ C ] a message that is automatically sent to you on your mobile phone or computer: You do not get a notification when someone unfollows you. How do I manage notifications on my device?
More examplesFewer examplesThose who receive notification are required to keep the information confidential. Admissions notifications go out in the spring.How can I stop random Twitter notifications? Enabling and disabling notifications for a user is not the same as following or unfollowing that user.
